name: Google Workspace (uvx)
description: Access Gmail, Google Calendar, Drive, Docs, Sheets, Slides, Forms, Tasks, Contacts, Chat, and Apps Script from a single MCP server. 100+ operations across all Google Workspace services.

inputs.label: Google OAuth Client ID
inputs.description: OAuth 2.0 Client ID from Google Cloud Console. Create a Desktop application type credential.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Credentials
2. Click 'Create Credentials' > 'OAuth client ID'
3. Select 'Desktop app' as application type
4. Copy the Client ID

inputs.label: Google OAuth Client Secret
inputs.description: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret from Google Cloud Console. Paired with the Client ID above.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to Google Cloud Console > APIs & Services > Credentials
2. Click on your OAuth 2.0 Client ID
3. Copy the Client Secret

auth.instructions: Create a Desktop OAuth 2.0 client in Google Cloud Console. Enable the Google Workspace APIs you need (Gmail, Calendar, Drive, etc.).
